nodes.text: Corwin, also known as The Durasteel Duke, was a male Human who served as duke during the Alderaan Civil War and the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

Corwin was both a celebrity and local legend, a charismatic and fearless leader and politician who had never once backed down in the face of threats or intimidation or refused to meet a rival face-to-face. Around 3643 BBY, he was a target of the Great Hunt and a bounty hunter found him, only to discover that Corwin was already dead and was impersonated by his sister to bolster his house's morale.
